website_summaries.verdict: This isn't the most powerful drill out there, but it offers a variety of settings to give you precise control over your drilling.
pros: 24 clutch positions help prevent screws from slipping
Variable speed settings with reverse option
Swap out battery packs when one dies
Simple to change out the bits
Lightweight drill that fits comfortably in your hand
cons: There's no battery level indicator, and some say it doesn't hold a charge for very long

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product - great for people who prefer lighter weight
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. I am a small woman, over 50 with arthritis and nerve issues. Normally I can't hold products like this, much less use them. This is very lightweight, easy to use, east to change out the bits and overall a great product. I have been drilling into plaster walls with no trouble at all.
customer_reviews.author: 99milesaway

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Lousy, worthless piece of trash. I bought this for my husband as a replacement for an old B&D of the same style that he really liked but had gotten old. This one, however, is nowhere near the quality and he hates it. It has about a 4 minute charge before it dies no matter what he tries. It's gutless and miserable. Never buying B&D again after this. It is truly sad when companies go from making quality products to churning out dollar store crap.
customer_reviews.author: Idahome

customer_reviews.title: My husband bought this drill for me and I love it. it's perfect starter drill and the perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this drill for me and I love it. it's perfect starter drill and the perfect for your DIY projects. I am only using this drill for small projects so it works perfect for me and for the price you can't beat it. If you are planning on using the drill everyday I suggest you spend a little more money and get a better drill but for those who will just be using it when needed, it works great
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home projects.
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for the around the house projects I need. I bought the extra bit kit to go with it for like 8$. They arrived packaged together and on time. Can't beat the price for the quality here.
customer_reviews.author: ABeck

customer_reviews.title: But the 750rpm rating (250rpm more than comparable drill-motors) and the great low price made this a 'No-Brainer-Purchase" for m
customer_reviews.text: The only set-back I have found (So Far) their is no charging indicator. But the 750rpm rating (250rpm more than comparable drill-motors) and the great low price made this a 'No-Brainer-Purchase" for me ... I like the battery contact protector for toll box storing too.
customer_reviews.author: MIXED-MEDIAS

customer_reviews.title: Good drill for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works well and has pretty good strength for a cordless. I just wished the battery lasted longer. I was able to drill a 2 5/8" door knob hole through two hardwood doors before it started to slow down. Should be able to drill a lot of small holes or screw a lot of screws. I also like the fact that it is variable speed...much better for screwing.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny A.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. I like to refinish old furniture and do minor repairs on my home. This has been a great tool to add to my basic supply. I even bought the drill-bit set to go with it and it's been a great addition. Easy to swap out the bits, change direction, recharge the battery. Storing the drill, drill-bit set, and charger is easy as they aren't huge and clunky and take up a ton of space. It has good power an the battery doesn't drain fast. Worthwhile purchase for sure!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: The chuck is not serrated ( it does not have grooves on the inside ) so it's not holding the drill bit in place and the drill bit will remain in the piece of wood until you take it out with a VISEGRIP so this drill is useless. In conclusion
customer_reviews.text: Cheap is cheap. The chuck is not serrated ( it does not have grooves on the inside ) so it's not holding the drill bit in place and the drill bit will remain in the piece of wood until you take it out with a VISEGRIP so this drill is useless. In conclusion, do not be like me and try to save a buck because in the end you'll waste time trying to get out a drill bit. Spend another fifty bucks and buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: stefan vladescu

customer_reviews.title: Really good cordless drill
customer_reviews.text: I got a cheapo cordless drill last year locally and it failed in a year. So I ditched that unit and got this Black & Decker cordless drill and it works great! It took maybe 12 hours to charge....no biggie. It works great....easy to use....comes with one drill/screwdriver bit and reversable. Plus, finding replacement batteries for this drill will be easier than that other one I had. 5 stars on this great B&D cordless drill....it works well enough for me. Not sure if it would totally replace a regular drill....but I will update my review later on.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey 440Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Too weak for most jobs.
customer_reviews.text: This works as a plaster stirrer, or to screw a screw into an already pre-drilled hole, but it doesn't have the strength to even drill into wood. If I didn't regularly mix up plaster, resin, and other things in small batches, I'd have thrown this thing out by now. It's pretty much just a stirrer for me. I got a corded drill to do any average-to-heavy drilling/screwing.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful drill.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful drill. Good torque and not so heavy a little woman like me can easily handle it. I put up curtain rods with it and fixed everything that needed drilling. I love it. I can hardly wait for something to break so I can fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C. Moreland

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great drill for the deal of the day price. Everything you’d expect a 12v drill to have. Building a pool house and this drill has been barely getting by. Obviously you’d want a 20v but so far it can drill and screw into pressure treated wood up to 3 inches deep. Other than building frames for buildings, this drill will do whatever you want it to do.
customer_reviews.author: LilSillyBoi

customer_reviews.title: Great starter drill
customer_reviews.text: Great starter drill! I recommend getting an extra battery pack if you'll be working on any extended projects - the one it came with didn't last long enough to assemble the couch I got it for, and we ended up switching to manual screwdrivers to finish it out. I'd definitely still recommend it, as it's lightweight, easy to use, and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kolbe Moss

customer_reviews.title: Like the bright colors!
customer_reviews.text: It is an old tech drill, I mean, no fast charge or other bells and whistles, but still practical and easy to use. And having bright orange body makes it easier to locate, compared to dark navy colored BOSCH, which always get lost on my work table.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Feeling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect drill/driver for light use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drill/driver for my daughter who was moving into her first apartment. it will receive light use it is inexpensive and just perfect for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: I think the battery is bad but I'm not sure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drill in May 2017 and after 2 months it stop working. I think the battery is bad but I'm not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great drill for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great drill for the price. I replaced a cordless I had owned for about 20 Plus years. Paid a lot for it and this is just as good. Retired now so only doing small projects around the house. This is perfect for those jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: Great power for small price!
customer_reviews.text: My “go to” around the house helper. How (or why) did I live without this for so long. I have put furniture together with it and it has a lot of power. I really like the fact that you can leave the battery plugged in all the time so it’s always ready to go. I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Drill is totally what i expected from Black & Deacker. !!!!! Great Drill !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: i had this brank cordless dril before but smaller. i got many years ooif use out of it so when it finally pooped out i wanted another same brand but a lil bigger. I bought this and im 110% happy with it . I have used it as a screw driver, drill and used it to run buffing wheels while polishing chrome on my harley and it has worked quite well for me. Penny :D
customer_reviews.author: PennyShea

customer_reviews.title: Not as powerful as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for little handy projects. Please know it's NOT very powerful... so if you want it to go into 2x4 beams and such... it will not really get you all the way there. A lot of my screws have stuck out a bit on things because it just couldn't torque through.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Mine did not come with the charging cord that is ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine did not come with the charging cord that is depicted in the box. Unfortunately, I didn't open the box right away and it is too late to exchange.

customer_reviews.title: It works great and helpful for home use
customer_reviews.text: It is important to have one drill a home for different occasions. This one works very well and enough strong to drill things I want. I have used it with my wood table, guitar, plastic box, cat tree. Very satisfied with the product.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but not that powerful
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best drill, but for basic projects around the house it does the trick. If you're doing any heavy duty remodeling/handy work, then I'd tell you to get something with more power.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Riemer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's much lighter than my 18V drill and works just as well. Does everything I want it to do. Great battery life. Perfect for household chores.

customer_reviews.title: It holds a charge pretty well. I was surprised that it had enough ...
customer_reviews.text: It holds a charge pretty well. I was surprised that it had enough power for my to use a self-drilling metal screw to screw into heavy sheet metal. I use it more often though as a power screwdriver.

customer_reviews.text: Great drill for the money. I bought this for my dad because he kept borrowing mine. For the average homeowner who needs a drill/driver a couple times a month, this is perfect.

customer_reviews.text: Pretty basic stuff. If you need to drill something real quick, this works great but I wouldn't use it as a drill I use professionally.

It's easy enough to hold and once I figured out how to lock in the drill bits, I've been drilling holes seamlessly for screws all over the house. I would definitely recommend and buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong drill sent and doesn't match charger voltage
customer_reviews.text: The drill worked for a while but then quit working. Found out it was an 18v Black & Decker drill and was suppose to be an 12v. Also the charger was a 24 v and overcharged the batteries is why it doesn't work.

customer_reviews.title: For a basic cordless drill, it works great
customer_reviews.text: Without the fancy bells and whistles (LED illumination, charging indicator, 12v, etc), this cordless drill does its job well. The 12v power is just enough to get the majority of in-home tasks done. If it had a charging indicator, it would help with knowing if the battery is fully and safely charged. For what this unit is and what it does, while factoring the great price, it was a great purchase and I'd recommend it to anyone looking for a light-duty cordless drill.

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER 12V MAX Cordless Drill / Driver, 3/8-Inch (GCO1200C)
product_meta.description: The Black & Decker GCO1200C 12v Cordless Drill with Over molds is ideal for many drilling and driving applications. This drill features a variable-speed design that delivers up to 750 RPM for work in a variety of materials. The 24 position clutch prevents screws from stripping and the keyless chuck makes bit changing quick and simple. The soft grips provide additional comfort while using on projects. It has a slide pack battery that provides easy installation and removal of the battery. Includes: (1) 12V Battery, (1) Charger and (1) Double Ended Bit.
feature_bullets: 24 Position clutch prevents screws from stripping
Slide pack battery provides easy installation and removal of the battery
Keyless Chuck for simple bit changes
Chuck Size: 3/8" in; Clutch Setting: 24; Included Components: (1) GCO1200C Drill/Driver, (1) 12V Battery, (1) Charger, (1) Double Ended Bit; Power Source: Cordless

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars321 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
